last_episode_to_air.name: Farewell
last_episode_to_air.overview: A shocking realization points Sugar toward a discovery that changes everything.

name: Sugar
overview: An enigmatic private detective struggles with personal demons as he investigates the disappearance of a Hollywood producer's beloved granddaughter.

episodes.name: Olivia
episodes.overview: After solving a case in Japan, private eye John Sugar returns to LA to help find a missing woman with ties to a Hollywood legend.

episodes.name: These People, These Places
episodes.overview: Sugar suspects Melanie's not telling the full story. Meanwhile, he and Ruby may not be the only ones looking into the mysterious body in Olivia's trunk.

episodes.name: Shibuya Crossing
episodes.overview: Melanie and Sugar get caught in a dicey situation—and make a new enemy. Sugar reunites with old friends, but he senses some are keeping secrets.

episodes.name: Starry-Eyed
episodes.overview: Sugar and Melanie track down Olivia's friend, who shares disturbing information about Davy and his family. Davy and Kenny dig into Sugar's past.

episodes.name: Boy in the Corner
episodes.overview: Melanie gets a surprise visit that unleashes Sugar's dark side. Ruby receives chilling guidance from a colleague. Davy makes a tragic decision.

episodes.name: Go Home
episodes.overview: Sugar thinks he's made a break in the case. When a double cross forces him to do the unthinkable, he turns to Melanie and Henry for help.

episodes.name: The Friends You Keep
episodes.overview: Sugar's fears for the safety of his friends lead him to a clandestine gathering where he learns a dangerous secret—and the truth about Olivia.

episodes.name: Farewell
episodes.overview: A shocking realization points Sugar toward a discovery that changes everything.
